priority.description: priority of plugins by customized order

filter.description: filter determines whether the plugin needs to be executed at runtime

schema.$comment: this is a mark for our injected plugin schema

verify.description: Turn on server certificate verification, currently only kafka upstream is supported

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

scheme.description: The scheme of the upstream. For L7 proxy, it can be one of grpc/grpcs/http/https. For L4 proxy, it can be one of tcp/tls/udp. For specific protocols, it can be kafka.

verify.description: Turn on server certificate verification, currently only kafka upstream is supported

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

scheme.description: The scheme of the upstream. For L7 proxy, it can be one of grpc/grpcs/http/https. For L4 proxy, it can be one of tcp/tls/udp. For specific protocols, it can be kafka.

type.description: ssl certificate type, server to server certificate, client to client certificate for upstream

status.description: ssl status, 1 to enable, 0 to disable

items.description: uri regular expression to skip mtls

verify.description: Turn on server certificate verification, currently only kafka upstream is supported

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

scheme.description: The scheme of the upstream. For L7 proxy, it can be one of grpc/grpcs/http/https. For L4 proxy, it can be one of tcp/tls/udp. For specific protocols, it can be kafka.

status.description: route status, 1 to enable, 0 to disable
